title: Smart Data Models - DiscExcContIEEEDEC3A
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Type DEC3A model. In some systems, the stabilizer output is disconnected from the regulator immediately following a severe fault to prevent the stabilizer from competing with action of voltage regulator during the first swing.  Reference: IEEE Standard 421.5-2005 Section 12.4.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be DiscExcContIEEEDEC3A

tdr.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reset time delay (). Default: 0

vtmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Terminal undervoltage comparison level (). Default: 0.0
